articles.title: How Ursula K. Le Guin Fooled the Poet Robert Hass
articles.description: “I thought that I had discovered that I loved science fiction,” says Hass, whose new collection is “Summer Snow.” Then he “read a lot of it and discovered that I just loved Ursula Le Guin.”
articles.content:
Was there a book of poems or a poet in particular that inspired you to write?
No. Many poets. But reading the poets who had begun to publish in the 1940s and 50s opened up worlds to me. The list would be long of the poets I was reading then, mostly in anthol… [+4153 chars]
